programmes.show_name: Katie Piper: Locked Up In Louisiana
programmes.show_description: Katie meets Kimberly, who is accused of killing a woman she was dating, and learns that Kimberly's life derailed after she got into a car accident and became addicted to opioids.

programmes.show_name: Louis Theroux: The Most Hated Family in America
programmes.show_description: Wry observer of oddballs Louis Theroux turns his attention to the Phelps clan who picket America, promoting an intolerance of gay life.
Louis meets an eccentric cosmetic surgeon as he investigates image obsession in California - the birthplace of plastic surgery. Will he be tempted to go under the knife?
Michael McIntyre hosts the Saturday-night game show, joined by Richard E Grant, Saffron Barker, David Haye, Anneka Rice, Danny Jones, Jo Brand and Melvin Odoom.
Shopping from Home.
It's Elimination Day and the contestants have a two-round challenge that includes a taste test. The winners receive a colour that they must use as inspiration for their dish.
Paramedics are called to a 67-year-old with a lung condition who can't breathe. Plus, crews help a 53-year-old who's had several seizures.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Hessle: The DIY SOS team and hundreds of kind volunteers step up to help the recently widowed and wheelchair-bound Darren and his three sons.
Torquay: In Torquay, the team help multiple sclerosis sufferer Stuart, his daughter Lauren and his mother Lin, who cares for Stuart despite being completely blind.
Plymouth: In Plymouth, the team help the Morfey family. Two of the boys have cerebral palsy, and the family has been struggling to make their multi-level home disabled-friendly.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Another renovation challenge for Drew and Jonathan Scott. Here they help brothers Scott and Trevor, who are looking for an all-in-one investment and living solution.
Property renovation series hosted by Drew and Jonathan Scott. A couple searches for their dream home, but first must agree on the right location.
Hessle: The DIY SOS team and hundreds of kind volunteers step up to help the recently widowed and wheelchair-bound Darren and his three sons.
Crumble's Big Adventure: Pete meets Staffy Boxer Cross Crumble, who's been at the centre in Basildon for over three years, stuck without a foster or permanent home in sight.
An asthmatic deteriorates rapidly in the ambulance, and the crews are called to a 30-year-old car that's been driven into a wall by a 90-year-old driver.
Reality series following the work of Yorkshire Hazardous Area Response Team. The team try to seal a major chemical spill and help a teenager who fell down a chimney.
Reality series following Yorkshire Ambulance Service's Hazardous Area Response Team. In this edition the team race to save a man who has been shot outside a mosque.
Mosh and Kren tend to a 35-week pregnant woman with severe bleeding. Meanwhile, Paramedics rush to Sydney airport following a bomb threat.

...Most Hated Family in Crisis. Following up on his 2007 documentary, The Most Hated Family in America, Louis Theroux returns to Topeka, Kansas, for a week-long visit with the Westboro Baptist Church.

programmes.show_name: Louis Theroux's LA Stories: Among The Sex Offenders
programmes.show_description: In his final LA Story, Louis Theroux spends time in the twilight world of the city's paroled sex offenders, who live under force of tough regulations.
Dermot O'Leary, Penny Lancaster, Krishnan Guru-Murthy, Judi Love, Michael Vaughan, Craig Revel Horwood and Nikki Fox are on hand to assist the contestants hoping to win big.
Shopping from Home.
Hide and Seek: Rachel takes up her duties as an Inspector by organising a joint raid with CID on a crack den, where a frightened young girl is found boarded up in the fireplace.
First Strike: Rachel is frustrated when two brothers offer different versions of the stabbing of a drug dealer. Will gets a chance to impress Neil, who makes him an interesting offer.
Hold Me Tight: Part 1: A hysterical mother reports her eight-year-old daughter missing, but when a body is discovered the only two suspects are released for lack of evidence.
Hold Me Tight: Part 2: Evidence reveals Mason Kemble was present at his classmate's murder and Neil arrests him. Grace becomes frustrated as she struggles to get the truth out of the boy.
The Rookie: Will joins the CID team as a trainee, and tackles the case of a developer who goes missing after threats from anti-capitalist protesters and a protection racketeer.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning its 10,000 pound jackpot.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which four players take on an extraordinary machine.
A Lamborghini supercar crashes and bursts into flames, leaving two passengers with serious injuries. Also, a patient requiring urgent care leaves the team with an outsized problem.
A car being pursued by police crashes and HART are called to treat a passenger trapped in her seat with serious injuries. Meanwhile, floodwaters swamp a Yorkshire town.
A horse rider is hit by a car on a country road, leaving both her and her horse with serious injuries. Plus, the centre of Leeds is locked down after a suspicious package is found.
The HART paramedics race to rescue the passenger of a car involved in a high speed crash, and the medics face crossing a fast-flowing river to help a man who's gone missing from home.
Caroline treats an unvaccinated Covid patient who's been in a coma for weeks. Matron Hazera assesses a deep tissue injury and Kat cares for a man in pain after kidney stone surgery.
Matron Hazera is called to save a person standing on the edge of a building, while nurse Kat treats a woman with suspected ovarian cancer.
The second series of the hilarious comedy sketch show begins. Characters this time include Lauren, Derek Faye, who may find someone impertinent, and Nan.
Catherine Tate's back with another batch of brilliantly observed characters, including an unorthodox dog trainer whose methods produce quite frankly hair-raising results.
Award-winning comedy sketch series with characters played by the versatile actress. Tactful wigmakers to the stars Ivan and Trudy are introduced. Una Stubbs guest stars.
